content: Savings Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 13 May 2019How should i start investing after ORD?Just ORD-ed a few days ago and am just starting to learn a little more about investing (should have started way before i enlisted) will be starting to work full-time soon as I am not going to further my studies after my diploma.Currently I have6k in CIMB Fastsaver A/C3k total in Savings A/C (2k in Frank OCBC and 1k in POSB)Any opinions, or things that I should look out for?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 14 May 2019I think you will need to build up your insurance protection, emergency savings and later think about how or what to invest.Set up your accounts, do your research whether be it roboadvisors, stocks, etfs, decide your investment plan and go with it.0 comments1
